import React, { useContext } from 'react' import './CartItems.css' import { ShopContext } from '../../Context/ShopContext' import remove_icon from '../Assets/cart_cross_icon.png' const CartItems = (props) => { const {all_product,cartItems,removeFromCart} = useContext(ShopContext); return (

Products

Title

Price

Quantity

Total

Remove

{all_product.map((e)=>{ if(cartItems[e.id]>0) { return

{e.name}

${e.new_price}

{e.new_price*cartItems[e.id]}

{removeFromCart(e.id)}} alt="" />
} })}

ver

) } export default CartItems
